title: Important Update: CBIC Extends SCMTR Transitional Provisions till March 31, 2026
content:
# Important Update: CBIC Extends SCMTR Transitional Provisions till March 31, 2026

Ek important update hai. Government ne Sea Cargo Manifest and Transhipment Regulations (SCMTR) ke transitional provisions ko extend karne ka announce kiya hai. This extension is a significant relief for stakeholders involved in sea cargo operations.

Here are the key details:
*   **Old Due Date (Previous Extension):** The transitional provisions were earlier extended till December 31, 2025.
*   **New Due Date:** The validity of the transitional provisions under SCMTR, 2018, has now been extended till **March 31, 2026**.
*   **Official Notification:** This extension has been notified vide **Notification No. 79/2025-Customs (N.T.) dated December 31, 2025**.

This measure aims to provide additional time for shipping lines, carriers, and other stakeholders to ensure full compliance with the SCMTR, 2018, and facilitate smooth system integration, especially for SEZ units and remaining inland transhipment messages.
